resources.string: Send email with Bisq Phone ID
Please copy this Bisq Phone ID string into the field \"Bisq Phone ID\" in the Bisq App:\n\n

\n\nThe Bisq Phone ID contains (1) a token from Apple that identifies this instance of the Bisq remote app and (2) your excryption key (AES/CBC/NOPadding with initialization vector) which is used by Bisq to encrypt the notifications for you.
